title: UAE Emirates Signs 18-Year-Old Prodigy in Search for ‘Next Pogačar’
content:
Spanish climbing prodigy Pablo Torres signs long-term contract with UAE Team Emirates: 'We remain a team dedicated to developing the talents of the future.'

Read the full article at UAE Emirates Signs 18-Year-Old Prodigy in Search for ‘Next Pogačar’ on Velo.
author: ahood
